quest.name: Earning Your Wings
journal:
Softknox has told you about Rival Wings, a new type of war game incorporating goblin-made machina. If the thought of such fighty-play gives you heartthumps, you can learn more from Softknox...or dive straight into the action.

※Astragalos can be accessed via the Duty Finder.

dialogue.name: SOFTKNOX
dialogue.text:
Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Softknox comes to wolf place, learns that uplanders have many heartthumps for fighty-play.

dialogue.name: SOFTKNOX
dialogue.text: Softknox sees chance for busydeal. Offers gobbie hand-lending for uplanders to have better fighty-play. Crunch bone and smash steel muchly!

dialogue.name: SOFTKNOX
dialogue.text: Now new fighty-play is born, name of “Rival Wings”! Machina of gobmake help uplanders make much mayhem together!

dialogue.name: SOFTKNOX
dialogue.text: If uplander wishes to fill braincase with knowings of Rival Wings, Softknox happy to give many tongueflaps!

dialogue.name: SOFTKNOX
dialogue.text: Pshhh... Shkohhh... Gobbies make new fighty-play to give many heartthumps. Does uplander have strong enough bladder to try?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to undertake this quest, you must meet the following requirements:

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: ※ You must be at least level 30 with a Disciple of War or Magic.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: ※ You must be affiliated with a Grand Company and have unlocked the Feast.
